```{r plot variables}
plot_height <- 960
plot_width <- 2448
plot_title <- "Dayton's Weather In 2014"
plot_subtitle <- "Data represents average daily temperatures. Accessible data dates back to \\nJanuary 1, 1995. Data for 2014 is only available through December 16. \\n Average temperature for the year was 51.9 making 2014 the 9th coldest \\nyear since 1995"
plot_caption <- NULL
plot_font <- NULL
plot_bg <- "#FFFFFF"
color_scale <- c(beige = "#EED7B1", blue = "#0327CD", red = "#CC2524")
```

```{r plot}
my_plot <- df |>
  ggplot() +
  aes() +
  labs(title = plot_title) +
  theme_minimal(

  )

ggsave(
  plot = my_plot,
  device = ragg::agg_png,
  height = plot_height,
  width = plot_width,
  bg = plot_bg,
  dpi = 72,
  units = "px"
  )
```
